message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value to you, I propose a starting price of $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and potential ROI it offers to you. I look forward to discussing this further with you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I agree this product would be valuable for my business, but I'm working with a tighter budget. I could do  $900,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of the value of our product. While we aim to accommodate all our clients within their budgets, I must respectfully decline your current offer. I would like to counter with a proposal of $950,000. This price still allows us to cover our costs and provide a fair margin while offering significant value to your business. I hope this revised offer aligns more closely with your budget considerations.
I appreciate you working with me on this, Alice.  How about we split the difference and settle at $925,000?
